name: Pineapple Jalapeno Pizza
author: Catherella1
summary: Tropical goodness with a kick in every bite! A perfect balance of sweet, savory and spicy that is a great party pleaser or a quick and easy meal for those hectic days!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
1 teaspoon dried Italian herb mix, or to taste
1 (8 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese, divided
1 (15 ounce) can pineapple chunks in juice, drained
directions: Place an oven rack in the center of the oven
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Brush the entire crust surface with olive oil, and sprinkle with Italian herb mix, parsley flakes, and 1/2 cup of the Parmesan cheese
Sprinkle 1/4 cup of mozzarella cheese over the crust
Place pineapple chunks in a bowl, and toss with remaining Parmesan cheese
Spread the pineapple chunks evenly over the crust, and sprinkle pizza with the chopped jalapeno
Top with the remaining mozzarella cheese
Place the pizza directly on the oven rack, and bake until the crust is crisp and the cheese is melted and slightly browned, 10 to 12 minutes
Cool for about 5 minutes before serving
